dcterms:description: The ConvAI2 dataset is based on the Persona-Chat dataset and is designed for open-domain conversation tasks. It includes conversations between crowdworkers who were randomly paired and asked to act as a given persona. The dataset is used to train dialogue agents capable of engaging in meaningful open-domain conversations.
dcterms:title: ConvAI2 Dataset
